login_is_not_valid_max: Login must contain less than 20 symbols
login_is_not_valid_min: Login must contain at least 5 symbols
password_is_not_valid_min: Password must contain at least 8 symbols
password_is_not_valid_max: Password must contain less than 25 symbols
blank_confirm_modal: Confirm this expertise? You won't be able to make any changes after that!
instruction_ahp_step_1: 1. Evaluate the superiority of the criteria and alternatives among themselves for the help of the scale of differences:
instruction_ahp_1: 1 - The options equal to each other.
instruction_ahp_3: 3 - The option weakly superior the other option. 1/3 - if the oposite.
instruction_ahp_5: 5 - The option significantly superior another option. 1/5 - if the oposite.
instruction_ahp_7: 7 - The option clearly superior another option. 1/7 - if the oposite.
instruction_ahp_9: 9 - The option absolutely superior another option. 1/9 - if the oposite.
instruction_ahp_between: The grades 2, 4, 6, 8 are given in the case when comparing options an intermediate decision is made between two adjacent grades, respectively 1-3, 3-5, 5-7, 7-9.
instruction_norm_step_1: 1. Evaluate the importance (weight) of the criteria on a scale of 0 to 1 (e.g. 0.5).
instruction_norm_step_2: 2. Evaluate the importance of the alternatives by criterias on a scale of 0 to 1 (e.g. 0.5).
instruction_range_type1: How expert acts with direct input of the ranks:
instruction_range_type1_step1: 1. Evaluate the importance (rank) of alternatives on a scale from 1 to n, where n is the number of alternatives (for example, 3). The more important the alternative, the lower it's rank number.
instruction_range_type2: How expert acts with comparison table:
instruction_range_type2_step1: 1. Evaluate the superiority of the alternatives among themselves for the help of the scale of differences:
instruction_range_type2_desc1: 0 - The second option superior the first.
instruction_range_type2_desc2: 0,5 - The options equal to each other.
instruction_range_type2_desc3: 1 - The first option superior the second.
calculation_alternative_comparison_by: The comparison of the alternatives by criteria
calculation_alternative_comparison: The comparison of the alternatives by criterias
calculation_range_direct: I want to input the ranks directly!
calculation_range_compare: I want to evaluate the ranks by comparison table!
